job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Senior Machine Learning Engineers are drivers of their discipline, generating significant business impact directly and indirectly, and crafts the direction of product initiatives by being driven and having full ownership of their projects - from ideation to collecting data, annotating, feature engineering, productionizing and training model pipelines, deploying experiments, measuring and iterating on them - as well as coaching other Machine Learning Engineers, Scientists, Data Engineers, Product Managers, etc to do the same.

What You'll Be Doing:

     * Work on innovative ML models, algorithms, and engineering approaches with the potential to impact our business. Execute applied research plans to understand, apply, test, evolve, and generalize these technologies into reusable frameworks.
     * Build reliable and robust ML and AI solutions to address business problems, accounting for constraints of the production environment.
     * Develop production-grade machine learning code, from models to features and pipelines, allowing for scalability, realtime, monitoring and retraining.
     * Build readable and reusable code, applying in depth knowledge of business area tools and product needs. Choose the right technology or coding methodology by researching and understanding customer needs as well as refactor and simplify code (when necessary).
     * Monitor product health, performance and business impact and act accordingly when requirements are not met.
     * Solve issues by applying methods and insights gained from a variety of disciplines. Complete different tasks and navigate into several environments with a short adapting period.
     * Continuously evolve their craft. Keep up to date with industry and academic standard methodologies, periodically explore new technologies, introduce them to the machine learning community and promote their application in areas where they can generate impact.
     * Actively contribute to Machine Learning at Booking.com through training, exploration of new technologies, interviewing,onboarding and mentoring colleagues.
     * Push for improvements, scaling and extending machine learning tooling and infrastructure, collaborating with the other central teams.
job_details.full_text:
Senior Machine Learning Engineer I

Senior Machine Learning Engineers are drivers of their discipline, generating significant business impact directly and indirectly, and crafts the direction of product initiatives by being driven and having full ownership of their projects - from ideation to collecting data, annotating, feature engineering, productionizing and training model pipelines, deploying experiments, measuring and iterating on them - as well as coaching other Machine Learning Engineers, Scientists, Data Engineers, Product Managers, etc to do the same.

What You'll Be Doing:

     * Work on innovative ML models, algorithms, and engineering approaches with the potential to impact our business. Execute applied research plans to understand, apply, test, evolve, and generalize these technologies into reusable frameworks.
     * Build reliable and robust ML and AI solutions to address business problems, accounting for constraints of the production environment.
     * Develop production-grade machine learning code, from models to features and pipelines, allowing for scalability, realtime, monitoring and retraining.
     * Build readable and reusable code, applying in depth knowledge of business area tools and product needs. Choose the right technology or coding methodology by researching and understanding customer needs as well as refactor and simplify code (when necessary).
     * Monitor product health, performance and business impact and act accordingly when requirements are not met.
     * Solve issues by applying methods and insights gained from a variety of disciplines. Complete different tasks and navigate into several environments with a short adapting period.
     * Continuously evolve their craft. Keep up to date with industry and academic standard methodologies, periodically explore new technologies, introduce them to the machine learning community and promote their application in areas where they can generate impact.
     * Actively contribute to Machine Learning at Booking.com through training, exploration of new technologies, interviewing,onboarding and mentoring colleagues.
     * Push for improvements, scaling and extending machine learning tooling and infrastructure, collaborating with the other central teams.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes core ML engineering tasks such as data collection, annotation, feature engineering, model training, pipeline development, experimentation, and productionization. While generative AI is not explicitly mentioned, the focus on building and deploying predictive models, MLOps, and algorithm development aligns strongly with the 'ML Engineer' profile. The role also includes mentoring and contributing to the ML community, further supporting this classification.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'collecting data, annotating, feature engineering' directly relates to the preparation and transformation of data for model training.
The phrases 'innovative ML models, algorithms', 'training model pipelines', and 'training' clearly indicate the development and refinement of machine learning models.
The phrases 'training model pipelines', 'deploying experiments', 'measuring and iterating on them' describe the end-to-end process of model development and evaluation.
job_tasks.phrase: training model pipelines, deploying experiments, measuring and iterating on them

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'productionizing' implies the integration of models into functional software systems.

The phrase 'Build reliable and robust ML and AI solutions to address business problems, accounting for constraints of the production environment' points to building software applications that incorporate ML/AI.
job_tasks.phrase: Build reliable and robust ML and AI solutions to address business problems, accounting for constraints of the production environment

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Develop production-grade machine learning code, from models to features and pipelines, allowing for scalability, realtime, monitoring and retraining' describes the software engineering aspects of creating ML systems.
job_tasks.phrase: Develop production-grade machine learning code, from models to features and pipelines, allowing for scalability, realtime, monitoring and retraining

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Build readable and reusable code, applying in depth knowledge of business area tools and product needs' refers to standard software development practices.
job_tasks.phrase: Build readable and reusable code, applying in depth knowledge of business area tools and product needs

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'productionizing' and 'deploying experiments' are key components of MLOps, focusing on getting models into a production environment.
The phrase 'monitoring and retraining' is a core aspect of MLOps, ensuring models remain effective in production.
The phrase 'Push for improvements, scaling and extending machine learning tooling and infrastructure' directly relates to the operational aspects of maintaining and enhancing ML systems.
job_tasks.phrase: Push for improvements, scaling and extending machine learning tooling and infrastructure

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'generating significant business impact directly and indirectly' and 'crafts the direction of product initiatives' indicates a need to understand and align with business goals.
job_tasks.phrase: generating significant business impact directly and indirectly

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'crafts the direction of product initiatives' shows an understanding of how ML contributes to product strategy.
job_tasks.phrase: crafts the direction of product initiatives

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'address business problems' highlights the need to understand and solve issues from a business perspective.
The phrase 'applying in depth knowledge of business area tools and product needs' shows a requirement for understanding the business context.
job_tasks.phrase: applying in depth knowledge of business area tools and product needs

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Monitor product health, performance and business impact' requires understanding how ML models affect business outcomes.
job_tasks.phrase: Monitor product health, performance and business impact

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Execute applied research plans to understand, apply, test, evolve, and generalize these technologies into reusable frameworks' describes the process of researching and developing new modeling approaches.
job_tasks.phrase: Execute applied research plans to understand, apply, test, evolve, and generalize these technologies into reusable frameworks
